data.lyric:
[ti:Closed On Sunday]
[ar:Kanye West]
[al:JESUS IS KING]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Closed On Sunday - Kanye West
[00:30.00]Closed on Sunday
[00:32.44]You're my Chick-fil-A
[00:34.85]Closed on Sunday
[00:37.26]You my Chick-fil-A
[00:39.81]Hold the selfies
[00:42.23]Put the 'Gram away
[00:44.72]Get your family
[00:46.95]Y'all hold hands and pray
[00:49.27]When you got daughters
[00:52.07]Always keep 'em safe
[00:54.23]Watch out for vipers
[00:56.93]Don't let them indoctrinate
[00:59.54]Closed on Sunday
[01:01.84]You my Chick-fil-A
[01:04.29]You're my number one
[01:06.75]With the lemonade
[01:09.14]Raise our sons
[01:11.55]Train them in the faith
[01:13.75]Through temptations
[01:16.21]Make sure they're wide awake
[01:18.98]Follow Jesus listen and obey
[01:23.86]No more livin' for the culture
[01:26.37]We nobody's slave
[01:31.81]Stand up for my home
[01:35.54]Even if I take this walk alone
[01:39.17]I bow down to the King upon the throne
[01:44.11]My life is His
[01:46.31]I'm no longer my own
[01:49.07]I pray to God that He'll strengthen my hand
[01:53.85]They will think twice steppin' onto my land
[01:58.77]I draw the line
[02:00.99]It's written in the sand
[02:03.62]Try me and you will see that I ain't playin'
[02:08.55]Now back up off my family move your hands
[02:13.45]I got my weapons in the spirit's land
[02:18.32]I Jezebel don't even stand a chance
[02:24.41]Jezebel don't even stand a chance
[02:30.61]Chick-fil-A
data.trans:
[ti:Closed On Sunday]
[ar:Kanye West]
[al:JESUS IS KING]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:30.00]礼拜天关门歇业
[00:32.44]你就像Chick-fil-A一样让我停下一切
[00:34.85]礼拜天关门歇业
[00:37.26]你就像Chick-fil-A一样让我停下一切
[00:39.81]别再自拍了
[00:42.23]把朋友圈扔到一边
[00:44.72]带上家人
[00:46.95]双手合十 虔诚地祈祷
[00:49.27]当你有了女儿
[00:52.07]总是想保护她们 让她们平安长大
[00:54.23]对那些卑鄙小人时刻保持警惕
[00:56.93]别让他们对你洗脑
[00:59.54]礼拜天关门歇业
[01:01.84]你就像Chick-fil-A一样让我停下一切
[01:04.29]你是我心目中的第一
[01:06.75]将苦涩变成美好
[01:09.14]养育我们的孩子
[01:11.55]教导他们心中秉持着信仰
[01:13.75]面对诱惑时不为所动
[01:16.21]确保他们保持清醒的头脑
[01:18.98]跟随耶稣 听从教导 顺应安排
[01:23.86]不为文化而活
[01:26.37]我们不是任何人的奴隶
[01:31.81]为我的家人挺身而出
[01:35.54]即使我要独自前行
[01:39.17]我登上王座的国王致敬
[01:44.11]我为上帝而活
[01:46.31]我的生命不再属于自己
[01:49.07]我向上帝祈祷 希望他赐予我力量
[01:53.85]他们在踏入我的领地之前会三思而后行
[01:58.77]我画好界限
[02:00.99]就在沙土之上
[02:03.62]试试看 你会知道我是不是在胡闹
[02:08.55]现在离我的家人远点 把你的脏手拿开
[02:13.45]我在圣灵之地藏着武器
[02:18.32]我不会让你有机可乘
[02:24.41]我不会让你有机可乘
[02:30.61]像Chick-fil-A一样让我停下一切
